hero.title:
Empowering the Next Generation of
Digital Creators
hero.subtitle: We believe that coding is the superpower of the 21st century. Our mission is to make learning to code fun, accessible, and inspiring for everyone.

story.title:
From a Simple Idea to a
Global Community
story.p1: CodeMastery began with a simple observation: most coding resources were either too dry and academic or too simple and toy-like. There was a gap for high-quality, project-based learning that treated students like the future professionals they are.
story.p2: Founded in 2024, we set out to build a platform where learning feels like an adventure. Where "Hello World" is just the first step on a journey to building real applications, games, and website.
story.p3: Today, we're proud to support thousands of learners around the world, helping them unlock their creativity and potential through the power of code.

values.title: Our Core Values
values.subtitle: The principles that guide everything we do at CodeMastery.

fun.title: Fun First
fun.desc: Learning happens best when you are having fun. We gamify education to keep engagement high.

quality.title: Quality Content
quality.desc: We do not dumb things down. We teach industry-standard practices in an accessible way.

community.title: Community Driven
community.desc: We believe in the power of peers. Our community helps each other grow and succeed.

team.title: Meet the Team
team.subtitle: The passionate educators and developers behind CodeMastery.

bios.founder: Passionate about making coding accessible to everyone. Full stack developer with 10+ years of experience.
bios.headCurriculum: Expert in educational psychology and computer science. Ensuring our lessons are fun and effective.
bios.seniorDev: Building the platform that powers your learning. Loves optimization and clean code.
bios.communityManager: Here to support you on your journey. fostering a positive and helpful community.
